archeologyp1.shared

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • archeologyp1.shared.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    MAP IN THE SHARED RESOURCES
    Author:
    Daniel, Celine This class represents a loaded map in memory and contains map features that are shared by both the ADT and the MPT. The main method in this class is the viewing options method, which allows the user to switch their view between multiple choices.

      • updateView

        public void updateView()
        For the public void updateView method This method toggles with the user's view of the map.

      • updateView

        public void updateView(Feature feature,
              char symbol,
              boolean alias)
        For the public void updateView method
        Parameters:
        feature -
        symbol -
        alias - This method toggles with the user's view of the map. It switches based on whether the user wants to view the map as the natural version, the modified version they'd worked on, the counts for the three types, or the results of the tools if they'd opted to use those for the ADT.

      • getViewingOption

        public ViewingOption getViewingOption()
        For the public ViewingOption getViewingOption method
        Returns:
        the viewing option the user specifies

      • countNumberOfFinds

        public int countNumberOfFinds()
        For the public int countNumberOfFinds method
        Returns:
        the number of finds This method goes through the map and counts the amount of finds, regardless of type of find.
